original_text: And the border of the people of Reuben was the Jordan as a boundary. This was the inheritance of the people of Reuben, according to their clans with their cities and villages.
korean_text: 르우벤 자손의 서쪽 경계는 요단과 그 강 가라 이상은 르우벤 자손의 기업으로 그 가족대로 받은 성읍들과 주변 마을들이니라

sentences.original_text: And the border of the people of Reuben was the Jordan as a boundary.
sentences.korean_translation: 르우벤 백성의 경계는 요단 강이 경계선이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: This was the inheritance of the people of Reuben,
according to their clans with their cities and villages.
sentences.korean_translation: 족속에 따라 그 성읍과 마을들도 함께였습니다.
